creditline: Gift of Jack A. and Aviva Robinson
description: Pieced fringe with warp-twined (tablet) heading and cloth band Pieced, block-printed lining. Pieced black ground, mostly wool but with some cotton at the top. Polychrome silk embroidery in chain stitch. Silk/cotton ikat binding at the top edge. Nine medaillions, mostly red. The embroidery is presently hand stitched to a fabric covered mount; the verso is not visible. Mounted and stiched through white flannel on a black wool covered strainer.
title: Ilgich
